body:
We need to add support for propagating headers from a Workflow to a Nexus Operation handler to the StartOperation request.

In order to do that we'll need to first add an `NexusOperationInboundInterceptor`.

comments.body: I think we just need to add support for the [TracingInterceptor](https://github.com/temporalio/sdk-go/blob/master/interceptor/tracing_interceptor.go)

title: Tracing interceptor support for Nexus Operations
